page.title: 09SATURDAY FOR KATIE LODSWORTH
page.content: On Saturday morning I climbed out of bed,got dressed and had my breakfast. Then mummy drove my brother Timothy and me to Guildford for a special shopping expedition. First we bought some grapes and cherries. Then mummy bought me two pairs of shoes and a dress. Then we arrived at the Pet Shop. We chose our guinea pigs and the lady put them into a special pet box. I carried the box all the way to the car and mummy drove us home to Lodsworth. When we had eaten lunch I got my guinea pig out of his box. I enjoyed playing with him. After a while I put him back and went to watch television. Mum called me for my supper. After supper I watched television for a long time.
